name: The Witches Gamble
description:
The Witches Gamble v1.0

INSTRUCTIONS:

Space - When there are monsters on the field, tis will activate your attack, press the corresponding arrow keys shown on the screen to roll the dice

Click - When you roll the dice and activate your spell, click a monster to deal damage equal to what you rolled (Slugs have 3hp, dice monsters have 4)

WASD - Movement

Fight as long as you can against the witch, use your magical die to cast spells on the creatures she sends at you! This project was made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam in 48 hours. Makes sure to leave a comment and follow me for more games! 

Scratch User - @ShadowFall11
